record.dc:title: Array for detecting microbes
record.dc:creator: Andersen, Gary L.; DeSantis, Todd D.
record.dc:description: The present embodiments relate to an array system for detecting and identifying biomolecules and organisms. More specifically, the present embodiments relate to an array system comprising a microarray configured to simultaneously detect a plurality of organisms in a sample at a high confidence level.
record.dc:identifier: OSTI ID: 1140129, Legacy ID: OSTI ID: 1140129
record.dc:rights: Patent Assignee: The Regents of the University of California (Oakland, CA)
